patthana23.24:1.1: Nasavitakkasavicāraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā savitakkasavicāro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pannarasa …pe… avigate pannarasa.
patthana23.24:2.1: Nasavitakkasavicāraṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā savitakkasavicāro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana23.24:3.1: Nasavitakkasavicāraṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca avitakkaavicāro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā satta, adhipatiyā satta …pe… avigate satta.
